name: timschofield/weberp
description: Accounting and Business Administration ERP System
_comment: We use a patched version of phplot, while we wait for upstream to remove warnings with php 8
_note: the mysqli extension is required by the installer. Once we add to it support for pgsql and pdo, it can be demoted to suggested

suggest.ext-bcmath: Required to print barcode labels in PDFs
suggest.ext-curl: used by the automatic translation component
suggest.ext-gettext: Recommended for translations. A slower, pure-php implementation will be used if this is not available
suggest.ext-iconv: Required to print barcode labels in PDFs
suggest.ext-zlib: Improves the support for PDF files and XMLRPC API calls

_comment_2: Since we ship dependecies, force Composer not to download anything which requires a bigger php version
